entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
